fields.name: spam
fields.description_en: Posts as spam could include clickbait, advertising, scams, script bots
fields.description_es: Posts as spam could include clickbait, advertising, scams.
fields.description_de: Beiträge als Spam können Clickbait, Werbung, Betrug sein.

fields.name: pornography
fields.description_en: Posts showing sexual intercourse, photos and videos of sexual intercourse, nudity etc
fields.description_es: Posts showing sexual intercourse, photos and videos of sexual intercourse, nudity etc
fields.description_de: Posts, die Geschlechtsverkehr, Fotos und Videos von Geschlechtsverkehr, Nacktheit usw.

fields.name: hatred_bullying
fields.description_en: Credible threats, targets people, degrades or shames them, harassment etc.
fields.description_es: Credible threats, targets people, degrades or shames them, harassment etc.
fields.description_de: Glaubwürdige Drohungen, zielen auf Menschen ab, erniedrigen oder beschämen sie, belästigen usw.

fields.name: self_harm
fields.description_en: Posts promoting or encouraging self harm
fields.description_es: Posts promoting or encouraging self harm
fields.description_de: Posts, die Selbstbeschädigung fördern oder fördern

fields.name: violence
fields.description_en: Photos or videos of extreme graphic violence, posts encouraging violence, specific threats of physical harm
fields.description_es: Photos or videos of extreme graphic violence, posts encouraging violence, specific threats of physical harm
fields.description_de: Fotos oder Videos von extremer grafischer Gewalt, Posts, die zu Gewalt anregen, spezifische Bedrohungen für körperliche Schäden

fields.name: child_exploitation
fields.title_de: Material zur sexuellen Ausbeutung von Kindern
fields.description_en: Posts with photos or videos of sexual intercourse with children, posts of nude/partially nude children.
fields.description_es: Posts with photos or videos of sexual intercourse with children, posts of nude/partially nude children.
fields.description_de: Posts mit Fotos oder Videos des Geschlechtsverkehrs mit Kindern, Posts von nackten / teilweise nackten Kindern.

fields.name: illegal
fields.description_en: Posts promoting illegal activities such as use, sale or distribution of hard drugs etc
fields.description_es: Posts promoting illegal activities such as use, sale or distribution of hard drugs etc
fields.description_de: Posts, die illegale Aktivitäten wie Konsum, Verkauf oder Vertrieb von harten Drogen etc. Fördern

fields.name: deceptive
fields.description_en: Posts with purposefully fake or deceitful news, hoax disproved by credible sources
fields.description_es: Posts with purposefully fake or deceitful news, hoax disproved by credible sources
fields.description_de: Posts mit absichtlich gefälschten oder betrügerischen Nachrichten, die von glaubwürdigen Quellen widerlegt wurden

fields.name: copyright
fields.description_en: Posts with content that violates or infringes your copyright.
fields.description_es: Posts with content that violates or infringes your copyright.
fields.description_de: Beiträge mit Inhalten, die Ihr Urheberrecht verletzen oder verletzen.

fields.name: abuse
fields.description_en: Abuse might contain using bots, abusing the report button, spamming continuously.
fields.description_es: Abuse might contain using bots, abusing the report button, spamming continuously.
fields.description_de: Missbrauch kann die Verwendung von Bots, die missbräuchliche Verwendung des Berichtsschalters und kontinuierliches Spammen umfassen.

fields.name: community
fields.description_en: The item does not conform to the community guidelines.
fields.description_es: The item does not conform to the community guidelines.
fields.description_de: Der Artikel entspricht nicht den Community-Richtlinien.

fields.name: other
fields.description_en: Other reasons not included in other categories.
fields.description_es: Other reasons not included in other categories.
fields.description_de: Andere Gründe, die nicht in anderen Kategorien enthalten sind.
